posts.author: Theophilus Fist
posts.content:
I'm not big on spell casting and prefer to run in and chop off some heads before the casters can fire away.  Sometimes, however, I don't get to the casters in time and they drop a nasty spell on me.  Rather than be completely dependent on Cloaks of SR (or one 1 mage level and a box of Spell Mantle scrolls), I'd like to build a strong melee type that has some innate spell resistance or uber saves.

Of course a LVL 40 Monk with Imp SR 9, does the trick (as would a Paladin10/COT30 with a CHA of 30), but I'd also like a near-warrior AB (at least 41 unbuffed), so that I can actually hit something and matbe Dev Crit it.

1) PvM or PvP  . . . PVP

2) Level cap  . . . 40

3) Race preference . . . Any

4) Class preference . . . Melee

5) Melee preference , , . 1 hander, Dev Crit

6) Range preference , . . none

7) Weapon preference - any, 

8) Maximum item enhancement . . .  +5 for argument's sake

9) Spellcasting . . . any

10) Custom factors . . . none

posts.author: Valerfor
posts.content:
If you have some questions about the build,

a) Rogue in this build was taken for the Uncanny Dodge and UMD buffs, Uncanny Dodge it might not seem like a big deal at first with only 14 Dexterity but when you buff it to 26 maxed, that's 8 AC that doesnt go anywhere no-matter-what. Furthermore, 20 UMD means you can buff from any Wands that you want, your weapon will be happy about that.

b) Fighter Levels were kept in a minimum in order to achieve Dev. Critical & be able to take 6 Great Strengths along with EWS.

c) Monk constitutes the backbone of the build and it offers lightning fast speed to get on the most dangerous foe and quickly knockdown and Dev-Crit him/her. The 35 SR means that no standard spell-like ability from monsters will ever reach you (they all have 15 CL by default) but most important is the mind-effects immunity that you get. It makes you immune to more things than you can count them, it really is that good!

d) AC w/ Items +5 is: 29 (Base) +4 (Haste) +12 (Ability Enhancements) +20 (Items) = 65 AC, not many strength-based characters can say they have this much armour class without a shield.

e) Brutal damage, even without Dev-Crit, this build does an incredible & constant amount of damage, very quickly. Heavy flail is the ideal 2-handed weapon for the job.

posts.author: Valerfor
posts.content:
Are you talking for PvP or PvM or Modules?

For PvP if you want to just dance around spell-casters check my "Grand Master Of Flowers" build, or the "Iron Fist". PvP distorts the amount of playable builds to one-tenth of the normal, only specific builds apply there for maximum efficiency. You still have your mind-effects immunity though and your empty-body ability, both of them are undispellable of course. And the super-speed will give you way better chancces to get them, before they get you, if you know what i mean.

Must have been a special occasion, SoF specifically says that some of it's scripted events bypass immunities all together to give you the appropriate challenge.
